entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
